Author: bartwr#6773
Content:
@pandaanu73 For creating your 'smart chain' you can follow the instructions at https://docs.komodoplatform.com/basic-docs/smart-chains/smart-chain-setup/installing-from-source.html.

If you want to outsource the creation of your chain (and everything that's needed as well, like electrum servers, blockchain explorers, etc), you can use the services of @PTYX of ChainZilla, ChainMakers & others. PTYX mentioned ChainZilla's email address that you could use to send info to & get a quote. There's also https://composer.kmd.io/, a paid service for 'automating' creating a smart chain.

If you want to create the blockchain yourself: Follow the guide linked above & please let us know at what exact step or command you get stuck. Also mention the operating system you're using.

[edit] I missed that you @pandaanu73 messaged in a lot of Discord channels. Please choose the channel that fits your question most and from then only use that 1 channel for your questions.
